articles.description: Travis Scott is looking forward to spending holiday time with Stormi—and taking some less blurry father-daughter pics. Check out the playful shade he gave Kylie Jenner on social media.
articles.content:

articles.description: What songs might provide competition for Mariah Carey as a holiday No. 1 in the future? Billboard staffers debate this question and more.

articles.author: James Gant
articles.title: Ex-MI6 chief Sir Richard Dearlove says John le Carré's spy novels were a 'stain' on the service - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sir Richard Dearlove (pictured) blasted the writer - who died in Cornwall on Saturday - for 'successfully tarring the moral reputation of his former colleagues'.
articles.content:
Spy author John le Carré tarnished MI6 and his novels were a 'stain' on the secret service, its former head has claimed.
Sir Richard Dearlove blasted the writer - real name David Cornwell - for 'suc… [+27783 chars]

articles.title: Taylor Swift debunks fan theories about third surprise album 'Woodvale' - NME
articles.description: Taylor Swift has debunked fan theories that a third surprise album called 'Woodvale' is on the way in an interview with Jimmy Kimmel.
articles.content:

articles.title: Pixar's Soul Review (2020) - Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey - IGN
articles.description: As high-minded and celestial as its aspirations are, Soul never quite reaches the heights -- storytelling or emotional -- of past Pixar films like Inside Out...
